short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay in tune with your emotions, gain insights into patterns, and cultivate self-awareness for a happier, healthier you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A mini journal, transform your browser into a vibrant mood diary!

With Mood-Ring, track how you feel each day in a fun and intuitive way. Select your mood, and add personal notes to reflect on your day. Whether you prefer a clean vertical layout or a broader horizontal view with a calendar, Mood-Ring adapts to your style.

Toggle between layouts, view statistics with colorful pie charts, and explore your emotional trends over timeâ€”all within the privacy of your browser, no internet needed. 
Ready to add a splash of color to your daily routine? Mood-Ring is just a click away.
